name: Gedou Night 2
description:
Gedou Night 2: The Search for the Golden Squid

Made for the Pixel Weekend Jam #2

Gameplay:

Copy enemy forms using your Copy Bubble ability. Upon hitting an enemy, you gain their form using your Mimic Octopus powers. These will allow you to fight back against enemies, solve puzzles, and progress through the dungeon.

Controls:

X = Fire Copy Bubble. 
X (in a form) = Revert to OctoBoy Form.
Z = Use form ability (if applicable)

Story:

OctoBoy, the mimic ocotpus, is at it again! After finding the truth behind the disappearance of the Mimic Octopus Kingdom, he sets his sights on the lost Rainbow Squid Empire.
This time he searches for the mythical Golden Squid, hidden in the Castle of Colors! It is said to hold both the secrets and power of the Squid!
Will he be able to use his mimicing power and wits to find the three Rainbow Squid, and ultimately the final Golden Squid? Play to find out!
